00008 #ifndef OBJECT_H_
00009 #define OBJECT_H_
00010 
00011 #include "Status.h"
00012 
00013 #define Class(_class) \
00014         typedef struct _class ## _ _class; \
00015         struct _class ## _data; \
00016         struct _class ## _
00017 
00018 #define Inherits(_class) _class base
00019 #define Fields(_class) struct _class ## _data
00020 #define Private(_class) Fields(_class) data
00021 #define MethodName(_class, _name) _class ## _ ## _name
00022 #define Method(_class, _name, ...) (* _name)(_class* pThis, ##__VA_ARGS__)
00023 #define Implement(_class, _name, ...) MethodName(_class, _name) (_class* pThis, ## __VA_ARGS__)
00024 #define SetMethod(_class, _name) pThis -> _name = & MethodName(_class, _name)
00025 #define OverrideMethod(_class, _name) pThis -> base. _name = & MethodName(_class, _name)
00026 #define This(_name, ...) pThis-> _name (pThis, ## __VA_ARGS__)
00027 #define Base(_name, ...) pThis->base. _name (&pThis->base, ## __VA_ARGS__)
00028 
00029 
00030 #endif /* OBJECT_H_ */
